method: Liquidise all the ingredients. Season to taste with pepper, nutmeg and salt. Put into individual dishes or one large one. Cover with clingfilm and chill for two hours Sprinkle with a little cayenne and serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: 2 smoked mackerel, skinned and boned,  125g/4oz cottage cheese,  150g/5oz soured cream,  juice of half a lemon, or more,  grated nutmeg,  black pepper and salt,  cayenne,  2 lemons cut into wedges
